plot: Joey, a mouse caricature of Joe E. Brown, comes to visit a bunch of kiddie mice in their home inside a wall. A cat that's been chasing them is easily outwitted by Joey.
title: Uncle Joey
plot_es: Joey, a mouse caricature of Joe E. Brown, comes to visit a bunch of kiddie mice in their home inside a wall. A cat that's been chasing them is easily outwitted by Joey.
plot_en: Joey, a mouse caricature of Joe E. Brown, comes to visit a bunch of kiddie mice in their home inside a wall. A cat that's been chasing them is easily outwitted by Joey.
